property.name: Rules
property.value: Kagemaro, First to Suffer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. $, Sacrifice Kagemaro: All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Haru-Onna enters the battlefield, draw a card. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Haru-Onna to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Sakashima the Impostor enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except its name is still Sakashima the Impostor, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it gains "2##: Return Sakashima the Impostor to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shinen of Fear's Chill can't block. Channel — 1$, Discard Shinen of Fear's Chill: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: %: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kills and cooks your food in one easy stroke."

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Scouts of the Sakura Tribe spent two years wandering the forest to learn every leaf and tree. That knowledge was called upon during the Kami War to ensure the orochi's survival." —The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, return a red creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oni leapt easily from peak to peak, toying with its victims, its voice a purr from the rumbling depths of nightmare.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Tap all Spirits. • Tap all non-Spirit creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The strain upon the veil between worlds began to show near the end of the Kami War. Strange happenings that neither side could control lashed out across Kamigawa." —Observations of the Kami War

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add % to your mana pool for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heart of Sokenzan, I call to you Lend me your fire."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. ^: Matsu-Tribe Birdstalker gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has "`: Destroy target Equipment." Equip 1 (1: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: X^, `: Arashi, the Sky Asunder deals X damage to target creature with flying. Channel — X^^, Discard Arashi: Arashi deals X damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takenuma was filled with a chorus of moans, shrieks, and wails. Some came from the living, some from the dying, and some, most horribly, from the dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top card of your library. Exile the top card of your library. Exile the top card of your library. If the last card exiled isn't a land, repeat this process. Put a 1/1 red Warrior creature token onto the battlefield for each nonland card exiled this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may sacrifice a Swamp. If you do, return Akuta, Born of Ash from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Adamaro, First to Desire's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the hand of the opponent with the most cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware Adamaro In him all pain and anger is perfected." —Isao, Enlightened Bushi

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What part of ‘hayaku ikee' did you not understand?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, its controller puts a 1/1 green Snake creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With a sadness and a sense of hope, Senka left the colony of her birth and, with her attendants, set out to serve as broodmistress, founder of a new colony.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Kami of the Tended Garden unless you pay ^. Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick."—Toshiro Umezawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1#: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards in your hand, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soramaro speaks through me. Listen And I will tell the wisdom of the ancestors."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2%, `: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 2 damage to target creature. Channel — 3%, Discard Ghost-Lit Raider: Ghost-Lit Raider deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @, `: You gain 2 life. Channel — 1@, Discard Ghost-Lit Redeemer: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Channel — 1@, Discard Shinen of Stars' Light: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Channel — #, Discard Shinen of Flight's Wings: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1 for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Minamo was abandoned, its younger students found themselves thrust into a war beyond their skill with talents beyond their control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) 1%: Sokenzan Spellblade gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Burning-Eye Zubera dies, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, Burning-Eye Zubera deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Legendary Snakes you control have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) Whenever Kashi-Tribe Elite deals combat damage to a creature, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return a white creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The air filled with dust and the sound of wingbeats. The mothriders had joined the fray."—Great Battles of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 2 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.) 2%, Sacrifice a Samurai: Samurai creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before Shinka's walls were built, before the torii at Okina stood, she was there, tall and proud against the sky, and she will be there long after they have fallen into dust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (Nonexistent mana costs can't be paid.) Draw a card. Splice onto Arcane 1# (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you have 30 or more life, flip Rune-Tail, Kitsune Ascendant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player returns a permanent he or she controls to its owner's hand unless he or she pays 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In an age of war, time is measured not by sand but by blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gaze of Adamaro deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wherever it looked, it saw destruction—the wake of its own gaze.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power 2 or less can't attack you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Despite the massive forces that allied against him, Konda never once believed he would lose the Kami War."—Masako the Humorless

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Okina Nightwatch gets +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the most skilled budoka could protect the Okina Shrine. Only the best of these protectors took the night watch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nezumi insect-shamans enjoyed solitary lives, which was fortunate since no other nezumi could stand to live within half a mile of their foul stench.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Soramaro, First to Dream's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. 4, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2: Target creature you control gains flying until end of turn. 2: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target creature you control this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by two.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're numerous, attack in swarms, and are always hungry. No wonder we rats hold such a kinship with them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kemuri-Onna enters the battlefield, target player discards a card. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kemuri-Onna to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your maximum hand size is increased by two. At the beginning of your upkeep, return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of Minamo's students claimed he was as old as the knowledge he dispensed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature attacks this turn if able. Splice onto Arcane % (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kirin bellowed—an echoing, twisted parody of its once-inspirational call.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add $ to your mana pool. Tomb of Urami deals 1 damage to you if you don't control an Ogre. 2$$, `, Sacrifice all lands you control: Put a legendary 5/5 black Demon Spirit creature token with flying named Urami onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The orochi learned how to move swiftly and surely along the forest floor, like fish darting through gull-watched waters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices a creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Exile into Darkness from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nikko-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Nikko-Onna to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay 1."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before the war, we prayed to Kataki to sharpen our swords and harden our armor. Without his blessing our weapons are all but useless against the kami hordes." —Kenzo the Hardhearted

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Soulshift 2 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return Molting Skin to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have learned much from the orochi."

property.name: Rules
property.value: X%, `: Jiwari, the Earth Aflame deals X damage to target creature without flying. Channel — X%%%, Discard Jiwari: Jiwari deals X damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Secretkeeper gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is all the things that humanity was not meant to know.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 6 life. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Dosan's chant grew in volume, a second, deeper voice rose up in harmony behind it, strong enough to shake the earth and yet vibrant enough to fill the spirit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search target player's library for X cards, where X is the number of cards in your hand, and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may have target player put the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: %: Godo's Irregulars deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Godo trained their muscles and honed their skills, but he left their hearts wild and empty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spiraling Embers deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The akki knew to stay indoors on the days the oni flew their kites.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 2, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may sacrifice Dreamcatcher. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful where your mind wanders. Even in the quietest moments, the kami are listening, and your thoughts give them shape." —Lady Azami

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 2 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It seems that each time I visit Lord Konda his guards are more on edge, perhaps even more eager for the war to reach them." —Masako the Humorless

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that the feathers of a crane are clouds, plucked and sewn together by the hands of the kami.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Discard three cards at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The apprentice stared in puzzlement. "But Master, you finished writing those spells just yesterday. Don't you remember?" The jushi's heart froze.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast Curtain of Light only during combat after blockers are declared. Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Paint gold upon the wind,Shape the wind into a shield,And vanish behind the brightness." —Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard cards this turn, return those cards from your graveyard to your hand. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Pure Intentions, return Pure Intentions from your graveyard to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent chooses a number. You may have that player lose that much life. If you don't, that player sacrifices all but that many permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is a series of choices between bad and worse." —Toshiro Umezawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has seven or more cards in hand, Ebony Owl Netsuke deals 4 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Owls filled the skies during the Kami War, harbingers of darker times to come." —The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search target opponent's library for an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Activate this ability only if you have more cards in hand than each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He kept generations whole before the Kami War, and now he turns his century of wisdom to healing the latest casualties."—Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying @: Moonwing Moth gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Night wings sprinkled with dustOf a thousand soldiers deadAnd a thousand cities fallen."—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The paths of the kami crisscrossed Kamigawa like scars left by a maddened surgeon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Homura, Human Ascendant can't block. When Homura dies, return it to the battlefield flipped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have flying and "%: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent chooses one of them. Put that card into your graveyard and the rest into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like pools of fog that hid treacherous rocks from sailors' eyes, so too were the hands of the kami.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When nothing remains, everything is equally possible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. Undying Flames deals damage to target creature or player equal to that card's converted mana cost. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose a new target for the copy.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kiri-Onna enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Kiri-Onna to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ghostly objects around the kami circled faster and faster, creating a dizzying cyclone of motion. When it opened its eyes, it struck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, `: Draw a card if you have seven or more cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The words from which language sprang, the knowledge from which thought was born, the story from which history was woven.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment if its converted mana cost is less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Kitsune Dawnblade enters the battlefield, you may tap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a legendary spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After his death, monks spent ten years transcribing the tattoos from Reki's body and gathering stories from those who spoke with him. Thus the volume you hold was written." —The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hidetsugu never relinquished a grudge. He let it burn within him, gathering ever greater intensity until the final moment of vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put three 3/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They moved like apes, but a thousand times swifter, prying into every corner, leaving pawprints of ash.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target enchanted permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The more kami that passed through the veil that separated them from our world, the weaker that veil became, threatening to tear into tatters at the slightest pressure." —The History of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the case of violent deaths, kami offered a chance for revenge if the deceased offered up its corpse as a host to the invading kami.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 4$, `: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. Channel — 5$$, Discard Ghost-Lit Stalker: Target player discards four cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal your hand: If you have seven or more land cards in your hand, flip Sasaya, Orochi Ascendant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land you control is tapped for mana, for each other land you control with the same name, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add # to your mana pool. 1: Return Oboro, Palace in the Clouds to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Here the soratami wove their endless plots—graceful, artful, and deceitful, while the unwitting world moved below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Maga, Traitor to Mortals enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Maga enters the battlefield, target player loses life equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more cards in hand than each other player, the player who has the most cards in hand gains control of Sokenzan Renegade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Soulshift 4 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 4 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humbly I bow. Silently I wait. Deeply I listen."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a 1/1 green Snake creature token onto the battlefield for each card in your hand. Epic (For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen this great land from every angle. I know its every tree, stone, and river bend. Yet I have come to realize that knowing a thing is not the same as healing it." —Diary of Azusa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Walking the path of the kami only leaves you with singed feet." —Soratami saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3#, `: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 2. Channel — 3#, Discard Ghost-Lit Warder: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 4.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trapped for eons within the sacred gong, the kami boomed and clanged to a deafening tempo as they destroyed their erstwhile prison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Shape Stealer blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Shape Stealer has base power and toughness equal to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stand back. I know just what to do." —Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, that player sacrifices a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch over my father. Tell him I'm safe, but I won't come home until I find out how to bring him back to his senses, and Kamigawa is again at peace." —Michiko Konda, last letter to General Takeno

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Raving Oni-Slave enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, you lose 3 life if you don't control a Demon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, destroy all permanents with that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All bow at its visitation—some in awe, some in honor, some in fear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain control of target creature with that spell's converted mana cost until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fiery visitation burns away the fog of war and dissipates the ties of loyalty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) 1$: Regenerate Kuro's Taken.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simple bargains are the most tempting, and oni bargains are the simplest of all: eternal life for eternal service.

property.name: Rules
property.value: O-Naginata can be attached only to a creature with power 3 or greater. Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample. Equip 2 (2: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of any number. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and draws four cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rushing-Tide Zubera dies, if 4 or more damage was dealt to it this turn, draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cut off from the kakuriyo by the destruction of their honden, the zubera sought new ways to bring their secrets home.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One thorn to warn, ten thorns to defend, a hundred thorns to destroy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sweep — Return any number of Mountains you control to their owner's hand. Barrel Down Sokenzan deals damage to target creature equal to twice the number of Mountains returned this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hail of Arrows deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not let a single shaft loose until my word. And when I give that word, do not leave a single shaft in Eiganjo."—General Takeno

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My finest creations are fashioned after the moths of Eiganjo. They fly higher, faster, and more gracefully than any of my own designs."—Noboru, master kitemaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever the fourth spell of a turn is cast, flip Erayo, Soratami Ascendant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell for the first time in a turn, counter that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 4: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. Sacrifice Wine of Blood and Iron at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Godo never revealed what went into his special brew, but he always had more of it after great victories.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, name a card. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature #: Tap enchanted creature. #: Untap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a strong mind moves, form and energy shift to heed it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Channel — %, Discard Shinen of Fury's Fire: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Deathmask Nezumi gets +2/+1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We had him cornered, we did . . . and, well, you know what they say about rats." —Araba patrol survivor

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yuki-Onna enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact. Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may return Yuki-Onna to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bushido 2 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The akki were surprised to encounter a human who could fight in the caves as well as they.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Descendant of Masumaro for each card in your hand, then remove a +1/+1 counter from Descendant of Masumaro for each card in target opponent's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you have to search for inspiration, and sometimes it's right there in front of you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Ashes of the Fallen enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Each creature card in your graveyard has the chosen creature type in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ashes of the dead mingle with the soil, and both become as one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, you may return Death of a Thousand Stings from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mist was thick, cloying, and constricting. Shiro fought his way to fresh air only to look back and see his comrades fallen on the battlefield behind him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Masumaro, First to Live's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the waning moments of war, humanity's most ancient ancestors return. But whose side shall they make their own?" —Isao, Enlightened Bushi

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a black creature you control to its owner's hand. 1$: Regenerate Skull Collector.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your blood I'll use. Your skull I'll keep."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1@: Kitsune Loreweaver gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Know your history. The lessons of the past will shield you in times of doubt."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may gain life equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the most benevolent and life-giving of kami joined the war against the mortal world, but only with heavy and sorrowful hearts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulshift 7 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 7 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 2, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kaho, Minamo Historian enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three instant cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library. X, `: You may cast a card with converted mana cost X exiled with Kaho without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, regenerate Fiddlehead Kami.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like a riddle, it unwinds.Like a green wind, it reaches out.Like a sudden guilt, it seizes." —Snow Fur, kitsune poet

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Iname as One enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, you may search your library for a Spirit permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. When Iname as One dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target Spirit permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Me? No, I'm not going to kill you. I won't even lay a finger on you. I promise." —Kiku, Night's Flower

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It gnashed its teeth, and the battlefield filled with the screech of blade striking blade.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 2: Deathknell Kami gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Soulshift 1 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of the end step, return Glitterfang to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through the veil's rip spilled hundreds of minor kami, rushing over the battlefield like embers from a kicked campfire. Then they were gone." —Great Battles of Kamigawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Your maximum hand size is increased by one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's dangerous indeed to be lost in someone else's thoughts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have seven or more cards in hand, Akki Underling gets +2/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I lost my hounds in the war and thus found myself employing akki as servants. I found their training to be remarkably similar." —Kensuke, houndmaster

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sekki, Seasons' Guide enters the battlefield with eight +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Sekki, prevent that damage, remove that many +1/+1 counters from Sekki, and put that many 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens onto the battlefield. Sacrifice eight Spirits: Return Sekki from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add 1 to your mana pool. 2, `: Each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed." —Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of two target lands. Splice onto Arcane 3# (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices a land for each card in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In our war with the kami, we annihilate what is our own. Do they too suffer ruination in their hidden world?" —Diary of Azusa

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block Shinen of Life's Roar do so. Channel — 2^^, Discard Shinen of Life's Roar: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Descendant of Kiyomaro gets +1/+2 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of Kiyomaro flows in my veins. He did not let Eiganjo fall and neither shall I."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that brings it to life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, put four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 2, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Untap target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I feel their unnatural influence in the weary, weeping land. Do they care nothing for the creatures who walk below their clouds?" —Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sword is just a tool. It is the samurai's hand that delivers death."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays 1 for each card in your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sweep — Return any number of Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Target player discards a card for each Swamp returned this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Measure of Wickedness and you lose 8 life. Whenever another card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, target opponent gains control of Measure of Wickedness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulshift 5 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of the end step, if three or more creatures died this turn, flip Kuon, Ogre Ascendant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add 1 to your mana pool. 3, `, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kiyomaro, First to Stand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. As long as you have four or more cards in hand, Kiyomaro has vigilance. Whenever Kiyomaro deals damage, if you have seven or more cards in hand, you gain 7 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sweep — Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token onto the battlefield. Splice onto Arcane @ (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.value: 2^, `: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Channel — 3^, Discard Ghost-Lit Nourisher: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
